exports.label: Potential increase in EU exports annually

opportunity.label: The Agreement
opportunity.title: A new era of transatlantic trade.
opportunity.description: The EU-Mercosur Partnership Agreement eliminates tariffs on ~91–95% of traded goods over 10–15 years. For European businesses, this means lower barriers on machinery, chemicals, automotive, and manufactured goods entering a market of 730 million consumers.

points.trade: Tariff reductions on ~91–95% of all bilateral trade
points.investment: Enhanced investor protections and regulatory alignment
points.access: Simplified customs procedures and mutual recognition
points.timeline: Interim application possible in 2026 — full benefits phased over 10–15 years

whyParaguay.label: Strategic Focus
whyParaguay.title: Paraguay: the smartest entry point into Mercosur.
whyParaguay.subtitle: Lower taxes, cheaper energy, lower labor costs — and full access to the entire bloc.

hero.title: The premier facilitator for EU-Mercosur business growth.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.text: Mercosur First Agency specializes in matchmaking EU companies with opportunities in Mercosur, driving investments into the region — particularly Paraguay — and facilitating trade, client acquisition, and market entry following the landmark EU-Mercosur trade agreement.

vision.label: Our Vision
vision.text: To become the premier facilitator for sustainable bilateral business growth between the European Union and Mercosur, with Paraguay as the strategic hub.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Deep knowledge of both EU and Mercosur regulatory, fiscal, and business environments.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Transparent, long-term partnerships built on integrity and proven results.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.description: Streamlined processes that accelerate market entry and reduce operational friction.

local.title: Local Knowledge
local.description: On-the-ground presence in Asunción and European operations base in Vienna.

history.label: Our Story
history.text: Founded to capitalize on the historic EU-Mercosur Partnership Agreement signed in January 2026, Mercosur First Agency operates a dual-presence structure between Vienna and Asunción. We bridge the gap between European capital seeking growth and a region offering unprecedented opportunity.

vienna.title: Vienna, Austria
vienna.description: Client interface, capital origination, EU regulatory coordination, and institutional partnerships.

asuncion.title: Asunción, Paraguay
asuncion.description: Facility siting, licensing, local partnerships, and full operational deployment.

sol.name: Sol Sandt
sol.bio: Specialist in industrial production and design. Lecturer at Universidad Nacional de Asunción.

andre.name: Andre Justin
andre.bio: Extensive network in the European corporate world, facilitating international relations.

julian.name: Julian Sandt

hero.title: One of the world's largest trade areas — now open.

overview.label: The Agreement
overview.title: Creating a €750B+ trade corridor.
overview.description: Signed in January 2026, the EU-Mercosur Partnership Agreement unites 730+ million consumers across 31 countries. It creates one of the world's largest free trade areas, reducing or eliminating tariffs on ~91–95% of goods traded over the next 10–15 years.

points.tariffs: ~91–95% of tariff lines reduced or eliminated
points.scope: Covers goods, services, investment, and government procurement

matchmaking.title: Matchmaking
matchmaking.desc: Connect EU investors/exporters with Paraguayan/Mercosur partners.

visit.title: Organizing and Accompanying your Visit
visit.desc: From the airport to the hotel to your meeting or sightseeing, we can always be with you. Pick-up available in German, Spanish, and English.

Reduced tariffs on agricultural and manufactured exports to EU

cta.title: Position your business now.
cta.description: The companies that move first will capture the most value. Let us show you how.

hero.tagline: The Economic Engine of South America
hero.title: Investment Grade Stability & Growth.

macro.label: Macro Fundamentals
macro.title: A Beacon of Stability & Growth
macro.subtitle: While the region faces volatility, Paraguay stands as the fastest-growing economy in South America over the last 60 years, recently achieving Investment Grade status.

overview.label: The Opportunity
overview.description: Paraguay combines the lowest operational costs in Latin America, the world's cheapest hydroelectric energy, a 10% flat corporate tax, and full Mercosur access. For European companies entering the bloc, it is the obvious base of operations.

tax.label: Tax Advantage
tax.title: The lowest tax burden in Mercosur.
tax.detail: Paraguay's 10% flat corporate income tax is the lowest in the entire Mercosur bloc. Combined with 10% VAT and special regimes like Maquila (1% effective tax for licensed exporters), it creates the most competitive fiscal environment in the region.

maquila.title: Maquila Export Regime
maquila.description: European companies establishing factories in Paraguay to serve Mercosur or other export markets can operate under the Maquila regime at just 1% effective tax. Import raw materials duty-free, export finished goods at minimal cost.

labor.label: Labor Costs
labor.title: The lowest labor costs in Mercosur.
labor.detail: A worker in Paraguay costs approximately $550/month including social security — significantly lower than any other Mercosur country.

energy.label: Energy
energy.title: World's cheapest industrial electricity.
energy.detail: Paraguay generates 100% renewable hydroelectric energy from Itaipú and Yacyretá dams. Industrial electricity at ~$0.05/kWh — a fraction of regional competitors.

operational.label: Operational Costs
operational.title: 50–70% lower than Buenos Aires or São Paulo.
items: Commercial rents and land prices 50–70% lower than regional capitals
Low-cost water and utilities thanks to abundant natural resources
Growing infrastructure with improving logistics networks
Affordable professional services and office space

advantages.label: Additional Advantages
items: Macroeconomic stability — three decades of consistent monetary policy
Full repatriation of profits and capital — no restrictions
Tax exemptions on capital goods imports under investment laws
Strategic location for accessing Brazil and Argentina markets
Growing hub for nearshoring and European investment
Dollar-denominated economy with low inflation

lifestyle.label: Quality of Life
lifestyle.title: Pleasant Climate & Environment
lifestyle.description: Paraguay offers a pleasant warm climate, especially in the transitional seasons of Spring and Autumn. Even winter is mild with an average daily high of 23°C. Summer can be hot, usually in the upper 30s.

cta.title: Start your Paraguay operation.
cta.description: We handle everything — from corporate structuring to physical deployment.

hero.title: Let's connect your business to Mercosur.
